about_the_game:
Support Super Animal World with the Supporter Pack DLC and get 3 new animal breeds and 12 cosmetic items.

    3 Super Animal Breeds:
  • Super Dawn Songbird
  • Super Dusk Raccoon
  • Super Midnight Deer

    10 Cosmetic Items:
  • Caterpillar Costume
  • Caterpillar Antennae
  • Bug Box Gravestone
  • Butterfly Dress
  • Butterfly Bow
  • Checkered Flag
  • Hamster Ball Racing Suit
  • Racing Goggles
  • Hamster Ball Hat
  • Fishing Hook Piercing
  • Race Start! Emote
  • Mini Dragon Pet

    Super Perks:
  • 750 S.A.W. Tickets (premium currency used to purchase Super Animal Passes as well as premium cosmetic items from the S.A.W. Shop)

Neither animal breeds nor cosmetic items provide any gameplay advantage.
